meta.description: Maximize the total amount of sugar consumed by eating slices of cheesecake and caramel cake under calorie and preference constraints.

sets.name: CAKES
sets.description: Types of cakes available for consumption.

params.name: calories
params.description: Calories per slice for each type of cake.

params.name: sugar
params.description: Grams of sugar per slice for each type of cake.

vars.name: slices
vars.description: Number of slices to eat for each type of cake.

objective.name: max_total_sugar
objective.description: Maximize the total amount of sugar consumed.

constraints.name: calorie_limit
constraints.description: Total calorie intake must not exceed 10000 calories.

constraints.name: cheesecake_preference
constraints.description: At least 3 times as many slices of cheesecake as caramel cake must be eaten.

constraints.name: min_caramel_cake
constraints.description: At least 3 slices of caramel cake must be eaten.
